EmailTemplate.name: Accelerate_Cloud_Migration.Accelerate_Cloud_Migration_Nurture_1_Turbo_for_Any_Cl
EmailTemplate.subject: Are you in the process of adopting cloud services?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-cloud-migration-projects]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Too many organizations struggle with their cloud migrations. Without the right tools to evaluate the consumptions of their workloads, teams resort to overprovisioning which is expensive and doesn't assure performance.
It doesn't have to be this way for you and your team. Through AI-powered automation, Turbonomic provides all workloads the exact resources they need, at the right time, and always in accordance with policies.
Check out this blog post <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/turbonomic-cloud-migration/]]>from our Cloud CTO, Mor Cohen to learn more about how we can help you with migration planning. Regards, Team Turbonomic
